name: Molly Camp
text: Armando was professional, very helpful, and very polite.

name: Jessica Thacker
text: Convenient to use especially when life gets hectic, its nice to just stop in and pick up your order

name: Tamilyn
text: So easy! After a long day work not having to shop for an hour is so great!

text: I Have No Idea

text: So easy! After a long day work not having to shop for an hour is so great!

name: Danny Caudle
text: I Have No Idea

name: Amber
text: Easy to do. Love that the chose a substitution if they are out and you can decide if you want that or not. Makes easy for being on the go and working a lot. They do all the work and I have had the sweetest guys bring my groceries out.

name: Sonia Evans
text: Loved it...just ordered online and came to pick it up.  It took about 5 to 8 minutes to load up and go.

name: Yvonne Shaw
text: Convenient location. Walking distance 15 minutes

name: Stacie McDonald
text: Love not having to go inside and push a shopping cart around. Saves time.

name: Teresa p Jones Pera (Psycho)
text: Sweet ladies bringing my groceries.

name: T Brooks
text: It's kind of hit and miss with Walmart.  The last time I  used the pick-up service was great but the time before that Walmart canceled my order and the time before that, I  waited for more than an hour AFTER I  checked in.

name: Edward Lyttle (Lee)
text: Great place really fast pick up great service good people

name: Joshua Conway
text: It's ok long wait

name: Tabatha Williams
text: I like this service. New to ordering online take some getting used to.

name: Donald Duffie Duffipes
text: Did not use

name: april bigelow
text: Took the stress off

name: Jonathan “Jon-Jon” Hurtado
text: Amazing

name: Geoff Whitworth
text: Great service, right to your door, with great food at a fantastic price. Friendly Schwans man, eager to help. Try the lasagna, the pizzas, the ice cream, and the appetizers!

name: Brittany Eccles
text: I like their pizzas

name: Josh Whirl
text: It a branch unloading and loading..

name: Ashley Crim- Smith
text: Best place in downtown Prattville!!! They've got AMAZING pre-cooked dinners/casseroles that are so easy for quick dinners. And the BEST chicken salad ever!!! ... The boutique and antique shop inside have cute and unique items, highly recommend this place to anyone!!

name: Shelley Kim
text:
I don’t get a chance to get to Prattville that often, but when I do, I make sure to stop by here to purchase some casseroles and soups.

Connie, the owner, is a real sweetheart and very much involved in her business, always there to greet with you with a smile and help you out.  I think it’s so important to support your local mom and pop stores, while benefiting from food that is lovingly home made.  You can’t go wrong!

name: Joe Garrick
text: Good place to go in and get what you need prices are high but a in and out is good

name: MBB
text: Their casseroles are great and they offer so much more.

name: Chuck
text: These casseroles are excellent. The chicken salad and pimiento cheese are delicious.

name: David Pressley
text: Great homemade food!!

name: Hannah Barnes
text: I bought a squash casserole, a container of chicken salad and a container of pimento cheese. I went home and made lunch out of the pimento cheese and the chicken salad and it was wonderful, wow it was so delicious. I will be having the squash casserole for dinner tonight. 😀

name: JJ JJ
text: Highly recommend! My son loved the beef stroganoff and Hashbrown Casserole. We will definitely be back!!!

name: Carol Meeks
text: This place is so very pleasant & helpful. From shopping or to have a great meal.

name: Abigail Corbett
text: I love ordering their casseroles to go. Such a great quick meal or meal to take to a friend.

name: kayla dismukes
text: loved the whole place food was wonderful yummy chicken. salad lots to see will. go back

name: Marissa Wiles
text: Very disappointed in this store. Went in with my husband today to look around. Was trying to just find some cute jewelry. Unfortunately, we were subjected to a soap opera from the "manager" behind the counter and her friend in the store. We got to hear all about how the gentleman in her life was still talking to his ex and she would beat his a**. This is not professional for a work environment. The conversation was loud enough to be heard across the entire store. We left without purchasing anything due to the atmosphere there. I'll be highly surprised if I visit again.

resp.text:
Hi Marissa,

My name is Connie - I am the owner and manager of Fanci Free. Thank you for taking time to leave a review and bringing this incident to my attention.  I was not in the store on the day of your visit, but as soon as I heard what happened I made several unsuccessful attempts to contact you. I discovered this written review about your experience only last week.

I wish to extend my sincere apologies to you and your husband. I want you to know I have personally addressed the situation.

At Fanci Free, we value each and every one of our customers. We have a long-standing reputation of making our boutique and café a place where everyone feels happy and leaves happy. I am so glad that you enjoyed the quality and appeal of Fanci Free (as reflected in your ratings) - but on the day of your visit, we fell short of our overall mission.

As a token of our appreciation for your patronage, and to make amends, I invite you to return and enjoy a free meal with us. Then I will be happy to help you find that cute jewelry you were looking for - we have plenty to choose from!

Please call and ask for me (Connie Dismukes).

I look forward to meeting you and your husband. Thank you again for your comments and helping us to continue providing the best service and customer experience in the downtown Prattville area.

Connie Dismukes, Owner & Manager - Fanci Free Café & Boutique

name: Jennifer Lane
text: Okay if you're in a jam, but takes twice as long to cook as they say.

name: Teresa Ingram
text: Try the chicken spaghetti. Just WOW!

name: Anthony A. II (HanLikeAMF)
text: The Poppyseed Chicken Casserole is the absolute bestest.

name: nay redd
text: Wish the portions were bigger for the prices

name: Mark Paul
text: Another great place to get a bite. Very fresh ingredients on the sandwich. That peach tea that people come to get JUST FOR THE TEA I must admit is outstanding.Mobile is blessed with many great restaurants.

name: Robert Smith
text: At first I was happy to find out that this company delivered to my job, order food got it early even left the driver a good tip, next day had a good amount of people from corporate that wanted lunch delivered to the job just to find out they don't deliver in this area!! Very disappointed. You guys are the only delivery service that goes to the restaurant my company likes. No one from the company have not responded to my calls on the reason why you guy's stop after one delivery. Major opportunity just went out the window.

name: Jessi Stubstad
text: They were great, however since the change over, they are rarely open.  I haven't been able to order from here in over a month.  Recommend Waityr.  They seem to cover the same places.

name: Shelby Anderson
text: Drivers are always friendly! Owner called once to tell me they would be late and personally apologized and offered a discount on my next order. Port city is reasonably priced compared to the other delivery services. We are very impressed with Port City Deliveries!

name: Stephanie “Momma Sasade” Sasade
text:
While visiting family I discovered this wonderful
Local company that is the only delivery service for my favorite, Pizzeria Delphina! Prices are fair and they pay their drivers the whole tip plus the delivery fee. Manager on phone was very quick to fix my order before he sent it and food came before the estimated time. I will gladly use this company again and my family has vowed to keep using them as well.

name: Michael Keahey
text: The deliverer called three times concerning the address. The first time I was told that there was no *****North, so I corrected them: *****West. The second time they called they told me that there was no *****South, so again I corrected them. The third time they called (and by this time they were already 30 minutes late) they had me walk outside so that they could more easily find the house, and that would have been fine had they been sure that they were in the right neighborhood. Eventually though, they found me and they gave me a $10 credit for the trouble. I will still only give 2 stars because of my cold order.

name: Leslie Hakanson
text: Friendly and helpful office.  Friendly drivers. Good option when need food but can't get out/away.

name: Will Hannon
text: They put an emphasis on delivering for local restaurants.

name: Kimberly Williams
text: Absolute worst service EVER!  Have been ordering for over a year.  Sometimes 2 -3 times a week. Had trouble with their website this morning.  Austin answered the phone.  Told, by Austin, sorry your are having trouble with the website but I have four other phone calls.  Go handle those phone calls Austin.  Cuz, I certainly will NEVER be calling y'all again.  If I could give you NEGATIVE stars I would.

name: Music4Meka
text: I've used for over a year now and they're great

name: Jenny Nall
text: After I placed an order I was notified that it would take over 3 hours!  No one would return my calls or email.  Very unprofessional, terrible business! If I could give Port City Deliveries no stars I would.

name: Brennan Baker
text: These guys delivered in less than 30 minutes! I just moved to Mobile from Tuscaloosa and have been looking for somewhere that delivers food from everywhere thank goodness for these guys!! Awesome service give it a go!

name: jennifer brown
text: We ordered from work. It took over 30 minutes to place the order, then they called back and said that they had to cancel the order because the restaurant closed.  But they still charged my credit card.  I tried to call them back today but I only got a voicemail. My friend who ordered also, had charges come out of her account 6 times.  Beware!! They will steal your money!!!

name: Lance Mayfield
text: Pretty faIr and fast service

name: Nicole McCall
text: Driver was very kind. And the food came quicker than I thought it would.

name: Marina Buie
text: Great experience! We ordered from a different delivery company the night before and it was awful. So very happy to find a company that believes in customer service!

name: mill W
text: Port City Deliveries is a life saver. So many days I work longer than expected and can't get away for a meal. So I hop on the app and find a local place to order from. If the delivery person is running late they call and give a heads up with an apology. I also get texts to let me know when they are close by. They are always pleasant & polite. Tonight I ordered from a Chinese restaurant & my food was all wrong. Wasn't sure if I should contact the restaurant or PCD (since they brought me the food & I couldn't leave work to return it myself). I decided to call pcd. Maaan, I'm so glad I did! *AJ* did not hesitate to solve the issue.  He stepped right up & got the problem solved. Went far and beyond to make it right. Now THAT'S how you handle business! Dwnld the app, it's a game changer for sure.

name: Craig Tucker
text: First delivery experience. Fast and friendly. Good food, too.

name: Tracee Wallace
text:
I placed a lunch order today fried shrimp poboy with waffle fries what I got was blacken shrimp with tater tots. I called Port city they blamed Montego restaurant  I call monetego they blamed port city but nobody offered to refund  port city offered to credit my account fo the next time I use the I fee like l am being forced to use them #disappoint
July 17,2018. Today I was surprised to receive a call from AJ  to follow up. He apologized and  let me know I would be receiving a refund and a credit. I value good customer service and the willingness to go the extra mile to improve upon short falls. I will definitely give Port City Delivers another opportunity to provide great service!!

name: Brooke Crane
text: Now I can order from all my favorite places!!

name: Star Winstead
text: Always awesome experience

name: Deidra Dees
text: How did I get blocked from ordering food

name: Justin Lamar
text: This is my second time using their services and the employees are great and really hard working and I think I’ll continue to in the future

name: Christian Young
text: Great customer service and friendly

name: Logan Brown
text: Waitr is unreliable and unhelpful. I HIGHLY recommend using Port City Deliveries!!!

name: Beth Lowe
text: was told this company went out of business ???/   yes / No ???

name: Becca Croley
text: Fast and friendly

name: Adam Robinson
text: Ok service.

name: Michael Taylor
text: The owner is someone who misleads people

name: Jamie Chambers
text: Waited 1.5 hours with no update on the tracking. Other experiences were fine during the day

resp.text: Jamie, we take pride in getting our customer orders within the hour and our order tracking ability for our customers. That said, we could not find your account on our system and we are trying to make things right for you.  Please email us at FetcherOps@fetchmedelivery.com so we can research and make things right for you.

name: ken evola
text: Favorite delivery service in Auburn!

name: Dominic Binkley
text: I ordered carryout from a local Italian restaurant through FetchMe and was told to pick up my meal at 4:15 p.m. But when I showed up, the restaurant told me they don’t open until 5:00, so I had to wait for them to make my food - totally defeating the point of ordering online. I would not recommend ordering through FetchMe.

resp.text:
Hey Dominic, we apologize for the inconvenience due to this. After looking into this matter further it appears that our restaurant partner had altered their ordering hours and did not make us aware. We have since fixed their changed hours so this should not happen in the future. As a locally owned business we value your feedback. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you ordering again from us.

Regards,

Harrison
Owner
FetchMe

name: Jonathan Williams
text: Great to have some local delivery guys in Auburn. My food was delivered quickly and safely. Couldn't recommend these guys enough!

resp.text: We live to serve our customers! Thanks you for the wonderful comments.

name: Kellyanne Brown
text: Came to visit Auburn and was told to try this App. Not only did they mess up several of my orders from some of the restaurants in the area (Burgerfi, five guys, and a few other places I had never tried before), I was also accused by their customer service of lying about my food not showing up! How about you take some responsibility? HOOORRRRIBLE business who doesn't care about their customers, I bet all of these positive reviews on here are from friends and not actual satisfied customers. Do not waste your time using this app, unless you are fine with your money disappearing and being accused of stealing.

resp.text: Hi Kellyanne, we looked at our customer files and we looked at our customer ratings and feedback.  We can not find the information on the above.  Please send us an email at support@fetchmedelivery.com with your information so we look at your orders and make it right.

name: Tori Brown
text: Cheaper and quicker than any other food delivery service in the area. Excellent customer service!!

name: Patti S.
text: FetchMe really helped in a pinch and we will always use FetchMe, from now on. Great quick, friendly and most importantly ... professional.

resp.text:
Thanks so much Patti! We love hearing such positive feedback. Yall are the reason we do the things we do. Please see us again soon!

-Harrison from FetchMe

name: Autumn Garrett
text: Do not work here

name: Tyler Wilson
text: Best delivery service in all of Auburn/Opelika. They are up to date with their COVID-19 practices, and I will be continuing to order from them from here on out.

name: FetcherOps HQ
text: FetchMe Delivery is a great LOCAL company that keeps their customers wants and desires at the heart! They always call to confirm if something happens at the restaurant and even provide me with extra things that I didn't even know I needed (sauces, wet wipes for my wings, etc) Truly a great company and should be the only delivery company you order from!!!  P.S. They also delivery groceries and can complete on-demand orders.

name: A Foster
text: Always quick, accurate, & courteous!

resp.text:
Thanks A for the feedback. Glad you enjoyed using us. Please see us again soon!

-Harrison

name: Megan Huff
text:
FetchMe Delivery....delivers ;).
I love this service and I can't express how simple it is AND how wide their territory is!! I live pretty far away from everything and I see FetchMe Delivery drivers all the time in my area, it's nice knowing that if I don't want to cook FetchMe Delivery has it covered!!

resp.text:
Thanks for your support Megan! We love reading reviews like this, you made our day! Let us know if you need anything.

Regards,

Harrison and the FetchMe Team

name: Nick Patrizio
text: I've been using food service delivery apps for awhile now (i.e. Uber eats, Grubhub) and then I visited Auburn U and came upon FetchME. I dont understand how this small time delivery business provided me much quicker and more enjoyable service than the larger players back home but it made my first experience at Auburn much more enjoyable. Quick, easy service. The next time I visit for a tailgate, I know who I'm reaching out to. And you probably should too.

name: Lacey Harbula
text: Food was excellent.  The service was wonderful. Server was chipper and very polite even though she'd been there all day. Definitely would like to go back.

resp.text: Thanks Lacey! We are a locally owned and operated company.   We love it when we make our customers day.

name: Patrick Kennedy
text: FetchMe Delivery is the go to delivery service when you want to get it done right.  I use them every time I am in town.   Thanks for the great service.

resp.text: Thank you Patrick--We love serving you and appreciate your feedback!

name: Matthew McMullen
text: Couldn't ask for a better delivery service to work with or for! Both as a patron and an employee, FetchMe has been nothing but top notch. Fast deliveries and a great side gig!

resp.text: Thanks Matt! We love that you are part of the team that strives to have excellent customer support by going above and beyond that was expected and by ensuring customers issue are quickly resolved.

name: Alice Evola
text: Used this service several times while in town. They were on time, meal was fresh, and the driver was courteous!

name: Alex Harris
text: Honestly what's not to love about FetchMe? Super fast delivery times, super great employees, my only regret is having to leave such a wonderful service behind when I moved out of Auburn. They truly make you feel like it's FetchME, not FetchEVERYBODYELSE.

resp.text: Thanks Alex!  FetchMe is striving to be the best online retailer that you have ever dealt. Our goal is to quickly follow up on your purchase and ensure you satisfied with your experience!

name: Jamila Mills
text: Great service, friendly delivery, but the charging process is a bit wonky. Accidentally tipped twice and felt bad correcting the tip. The final bill is usually different than what you think you spend upfront. So if they fix that, 5 stars.

resp.text: We appreciate the review, Jamila, hope you are doing well!

name: Patrick Lovell
text: FetchMe rocks! Quick delivery, very friendly drivers and staff, and they’re always helpful and easy to work with if there any any issues. Not to mention the wide range of food and grocery options they provide.

resp.text: Thanks Patrick. We strive to ensure everything is outstanding, from the website selection to the fetchers to the delivery experience.

name: Valerie Hawkins
text: They are quick and have reasonable delivery charges.

resp.text:
Thanks so much valerie, we love the feedback and are glad to hear we were able to take care of you! If you need anything please let us know!

-Harrison

name: Harrison
text: Excellent service and restaurant selection. Greeted by a friendly face and received our Groceries and dinner in no time at all!

name: Lane Minor
text: GREAT SERVICE!

name: Miracle Joy
text: Great  service  and fast

resp.text:
Thanks Miracle! Glad you enjoyed your experience. Love hearing this. If you need anything please give us a call!

-Harrison and the FetchMe Team

name: Christopher Talley
text: Best delivery service in Auburn hands down. Most restaurants and best service.

resp.text: Thanks Christopher.  We are fighting everything to ensure you have thousands of items to choose from and delivery is FAST.

name: Esther Lande
text: Always late. Dont order taco bell is always messing up the orders

resp.text: We would love to help you but we do not see an account for you.  Please connect with us.

name: Michael
text: Great service, app works smoothly, so many options and love that you can even order your groceries through this app. There may be delays sometimes but only on gameday weekends when they definitely are receiving tons of orders all at once and having to deal with loads of traffic. Would recommend for anybody in the auburn area to use.

name: AJ
text: I was shocked they delivered so far out to my home. I'm quite impressed! Plus the delivery fee was quite reasonable!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback! Its comments like yours that keep us going--Have a great night!!

name: Lakeisha Lark
text: Over charged my card

resp.text: Hi Lakeisha, we were able to find your order and wanted to ensure that you were aware that there was an authorization on your card for an amount greater than the price of the order. This is temporary and a pending transaction in case we have to make a substitution on your order. We are seeing only one charge and if you have any questions please feel free to contact us at 334-209-7730.

name: Damien Boren
text: Great company

resp.text:
Thanks for your business Damien. Please see us again soon and thanks for supporting local!

Harrison and The FetchMe Team

name: Scott McGlon
text: AUsome service, easy to use, and a lifesaver when my wife doesn't want to cook and I don't want to leave my chair!  We have ordered food delivery with FetchMeDelivery multiple times and they all went extremely well with each arriving earlier than expected.  We even asked them to make a delivery with a restaurant that was not set up in their system and they did it without a hitch.  Great service!

resp.text: Thank you Scott! We are working hard at delivering an AUsome experience for the community.   Appreciate your feedback!

name: harry harp
text: This service is terrible use tiger town to go they’re much less likely to completely butcher your order which they’ve messed up slightly or entirely every time I’ve ordered from them. Also when I called to tell them they butchered my order to the point I didn’t want to eat and they said they’d refund which they did but they refunded $8 for a $12 meal not including the $7 delivery charge and tax and the tip I gave the terrible delivery driver. Either go get your food yourself or order from any other delivery service because this is not worth it.

resp.text: Good morning Harry! Thank you very much for bringing this to our attention.  We acknowledge that sometimes mistakes do happen and am sorry you did not have a great experience.  Your experience is the most important thing to every employee at FetchMe.  We reached out to the restaurant who controls the food quality and have addressed quality control challenges with them given they prepare your food.  We have also reached out to you in order to ensure things have been made right with you.  Please engage our delivery center so we can resolve this to your satisfaction.

name: pink pink
text: Good service lots of choices in restaurants. Delivery fees are reasonable and they are quick 😊

resp.text: Thank you for your review!  We are working hard at creating a great experience for you. Have a great day!

name: C Kinder
text: Always on time and the drivers are super friendly! This is the only delivery service I use in the Auburn area.

name: frances coleman
text: They go above and beyond.

resp.text: Thanks Frances, after a long hard week of making deliveries, this really made our day! Thank you so much!

name: Joy Evans
text: I work for a school and ordered lunch from Moe's. I wrote in the instructions and comments to place Queso on the side. I got my order and no Queso on the side nor inside my nacho's. I called FetchMe and was greeted by a very friendly voice who assured me that my Queso would be delivered. My Queso was indeed delivered and the driver was very friendly and not at all bothered by bringing only Queso in. Both apologized and made this hungry, trapped at work, Queso loving girl VERY happy!!!!

resp.text:
Thanks Joy, We appreciate the support and feedback. Glad we could fix your Queso emergency :)
-Harrison and The FetchMe Team

name: K-way Cotton
text: Very nice people and fast service

resp.text: Thanks K-way, as a locally owned company we appreciate your support and love the feedback. Give us a call if you need anything!

name: Tank Wilkerson
text: When your down & sick plus tired of pizza these guys can get you what you need!!!! Nice & timely

resp.text: Thanks Tank! The FetchMe team is  actively working to expand the options for our customers.  Appreciate your feedback! Thanks again.

name: Amr Abdul-Gaffar
text: Its a good service, I dont know why theres only 1 review with no explanation. It saves alot of time. And i don’t have to get out of my house when its 100 degrees outside

resp.text:
Thanks Amri, your satisfaction means a lot to us! We love the feedback and your support.

-Harrison

name: Houston Harrod
text: Extremely nice and professional

resp.text: Thanks Houston!

name: Jae Morgan Reid
text: They close earlier than their website says

name: Melisa Williford
text: Had no sign on the building

resp.text: Hi Melisa! Thanks for your review. Was this meant for us or when you applied perhaps? We are a delivery company that conducts business virtually on our website so we dont have a store front, meaning there is no sign needed and no building.

name: T Hill
text: I've used GTG several times and have had good luck.... until recently. The past three orders have been wrong, and I realize the restaurants put the orders together. But when you order and the driver has a copy of what was ordered, and you pay extra for options that you don't receive, it's frustrating and almost impossible to get a refund for what you didn't receive. I think they should at least check. I've used Door Dash a couple of times and have had great luck and faster service. May be swapping.

name: Gary Beard
text: Gafsden to go was excellent .food could have been better old chicken very tough to eat like the chicken had been under  heat lamps for several hours

name: Fire Salsa
text: Had a slight technical glitch which was remedied by staff immediately, great delivery time, excellent customer service, a very patient and very kind delivery driver delivered hot fresh food.

name: Parker Alexander
text: These guys are extremely helpful and deserve 5+ stars. I always get my food hot, service only costs a few bucks, and these guys are extremely easy to work with. These are good people and I trust them to get my order to me right every time.

name: Kirsten Phillips
text: Anytime I have ever used them, the delivery was always on time or even arrived BEFORE the scheduled time of arrival! I love the options available, and I love that I can order from two different places and they both arrive hot and fresh at the same time!! Two thumbs up! My drivers are also always very friendly, and have great customer service.

name: Sara
text: Quick delivery time. Been using them for a while and very satisfied overall.

name: Stacey Morton
text: My orders are always accurate and food is hot or warm when delivered.   Delivery times vary but never unreasonably long. Happy to have a service that lets me order from a lot of different places.

name: Mallory Nicole
text: I always get such good service! My food is always hot, and my delivery driver is always so nice. I can place an order from any restaurant in the Gadsden area and it will be to will be at my front door within an hour. Nothing but good things to say!

name: Hector Kitchens
text: This company is a great idea for our area. They are always so kind and polite. Never had a mistake and the customer service is exceptional. Way better than non local corporations like Doordash.

name: Marisa Walker
text: Amazing service! I always get my food quickly and hot. We get food delivered through them 2-3 times a week and we never have any complaints.

name: Daniel Freeland
text: Me and my wife can't get out the house like we used to. We order The Choice almost everyday. Every driver that we've had had been respectful and  courteous. If there is ever a problem they will take care of it immediately.

name: Stephen Martin
text:
Fast delivery and very friendly service!
I’ve used several other delivery services, but Gadsden To Go has always been the quickest. Plus they are a LOCAL business!!

name: Pamela R Tanner
text: I've ordered 3 times from different places and I've not once received my order. I always get confirmation of my order and a delivery time but no delivery so congratulations to those who actually receive their order

name: Yelonda Nance
text:
I love most of the drivers always here right at or before time we have had a hiccup or two but not at Gadsden to go fault what we as human beings need to remember is that everyone is human and prone to error so restaurants make mistakes and blame it on Gadsden to go  remember they do not cook our food nor do they bag our food they only order and deliver (cause I’m lazy lol) the owners have been great at getting these errors fixed and for that alone I’m grateful  thank you from a exhausted wife and mom
And the service you provide !❤️

name: Jordan Patty (Transcend Death)
text: Forgot food, driver told us to call gadsden to go, called and could never get through after staying on hold for over 30 mins trying to call with 3 different phones. Use deal dash

name: Ashley Alexander
text: Everyone at Gadsden To Go has the best attitude and exceptional customer service!  Every employee and customer I have encountered have had nothing but positive experiences to share.  I will always support Gadsden To Go.

name: William Brewer
text: Always friendly, fast and fresh. Enjoy the service and will use it again for sure. Thank you much.

name: Steven Otten
text: Great service! Orders are always correct and on time! Love it!

name: Drew griffin
text: drivers are always fast when delivering food and I have had no issues so far! We have never had a bad experience and will continue to use this delivery service!!

name: Bayley Tillison
text: Food is always hot and fresh. Great local business unlike bigger companies such as DoorDash.

name: Brandi Thomas
text: Love Gadsden to Go!! Food is always delivered before the time given & still hot! Highly recommend!

name: Parker Sanders
text: I called and ordered from Kati Thai yesterday through Gadsden To Go, and it was an awesome experience!  My food arrived sooner than I would have thought.

name: Ziad Ghanem
text:
Whenever I order, I get a receipt and updates thru my e-mail. The food is always fresh and pretty warm, the fastest delivery company I ever dealt with.
#SupportLocal

name: Rebecca Riddlespur
text: Love gadsden 2 go they always got my food good and rite when I get it..

name: roy jones
text: Ordered food tonight. My wife’s meal was missing but I was charged for it. The driver said she was going to go to rock n roll sushi and get the rest of my food. Haven’t heard from her and she won’t respond to me. I’ll never use this rip off service again.

name: Caleb Byers
text: I ordered from wings and seafood and for one it almost took 2 hours to get here. Then my wings was wrong I ordered barbecue wings I got Hot sauce mixed with a dash of barbecue....disgusting. When I  go there myself I always get barbecue wings but when they go it always be wrong.I’ll never order from here again .

name: Hope Waldron
text: Would give 0 stars if i could.  Waited hour and a half for our food to be delivered and it to be wrong.  Nothing in the order was correct!.  Called restaurant and they were going to make new plates and to contact gadsden to go to pick it up.  Another hour and a half has gone by and have yet to see them. Have used previously and orders were incorrect but blamed it on being overly busy due to COVID but for orders to be incorrect EVERY time is unacceptable.  Too much money to be such sorry service.

name: Linda Parker
text: We ordered Blackstone through through GadsdenToGo and received our food within an hour. You can't even get your food in an hour if you're inside of Blacktone haha. Great service!

name: Carla Har
text: I had an issue with the delivery, but it was resolved expeditiously and to my satisfaction

name: Sam Thomas
text: Fast friendly polite i would recommend them to anyone

name: Lydia Hunnicutt
text: Surprisingly quick. Great service!

name: Sam Summerhill
text: Great selection and speedy delivery!! 10 outta 10 would recommend!!!

name: Brandon Gables
text: Was right and fast and still hot

name: Brandon Parris
text: I am very displeased and unsatisfied with this service!!! I ordered McDonald's and want lunch and some breakfast items but McDonald's doesn't have all day breakfast anymore, so they called to tell me this and asked if I wanted to remove breakfast  things I said yes they gave my money back for item's  and my food was supposed to be at my house between 12 and 12:30  so here I am very hungry waiting for my food cant walk or drive because I have a broken pelvis and is now after 1 and when I called they told me they just canceled my whole order instead of just my breakfast item and then I cant even reorder my food because they have  removed McDonald's from their site to change it to where it doesn't show all day breakfast so now I'm just hungry without being able to get my McDonald's and that's the only thing that I wanted.

name: Frances Johnson
text: Great fast service and delivery...

name: Emily Ozment
text: This is not the first time my order has been incorrect. I understand there are different difficulties due to Covid 19, however this does not excuse the issues with today’s order. I placed my order at 8:40 am to be delivered at 11:45. I received a call at 12:10 from Gadsden to Go telling me the food would be a “little later”. No problem. The food was delivered around 12:35 the driver handed me the food and left. When I checked the food it was not my order. When I called to tell Gadsden to Go of the issue the person I spoke with honestly I think could care less. In the past when there was an issue it was taken care of/ dealt with quickly. I order from Gadsden to go a lot for our office, but after today I will no longer use this service if the level of indifference to the customers is standard.

name: Daphne Ragland
text: I ordered food and it took over 2 hours to receive. This made me miss my lunch break. The female driver stated she got lost. The driver was filthy and smelled really bed...like pets and smoke. I could not even image what the inside of the vehicle was like. Will NOT use Gadsden to Go again!! PLEASE hire drivers that are presentable if you would like this business to prosper.. because the last thing someone wants is for a nasty and smelly person delivering the food they eat. Thanks!!

name: amber cockrel
text: Love them they are very nice and fast with the food

name: amber cockrel
text: Love them they are very nice and fast with the food

name: Holli Jones
text: I'm giving it 1 star for the variety of restaurants to choose from & 1 star for the accuracy on delivery timing. Other than that, I'm not impressed. I ordered my fav pizza from Blackstone! What I got was cold & hard. It's not that far from my job so I'm not sure why it was so cold. The price of the pizza is fine.... however my $9 pizza ended up being $18.5!!!! Taxe of course but was charged $0.50 for processing, $4 for delivery & then $2.89 tip, which wasn't even 15%. Sorry but take the rest out of the $4. No I'll never use this service again.

name: Laura Sweatt
text: The service was a little bit slow

name: Chris
text:
WORST DELIVERY SERVICE EVER

They charge 5 dollars to deliver anything I understand that you have to pay drivers but it’s not worth it when I could get it myself cheaper I wish Gadsden to go would go disappear

name: Thomas Jackson
text: Great service and friendly staff

name: Hal Scoggins
text: Ordered from Gadsden to go Tuesday April 14th  while at comfort inn suites Gadsden and the food never came this service should not be allowed to operate we will never use them again

name: stacy lewis
text: My food was delivered in less than 30 mins after submitting order!

name: Angela Sparks
text: 1 star only because I can't leave less of one. Placed my order at 8:22pm and was told my order would be delivered between 9:37 & 10:07pm. Here I am at 10:24pm and NO ORDER, NO PHONE CALL, but they gladly took my money. I am seriously disappointed and will not use them again.  No one even answers on the main love. Been calling since 9:45. I'm livid.

name: Kelly Williams
text: Well today was my first time using Gadsden to go and sadly to say I won’t use them again‼️‼️‼️....I placed my order at 4:39 and my food got here 5:45 fries were cold and soggy and so were my wings

name: Micah Starnes
text: Just a bad experience all around. I waited for 3 hours (the website doesn’t tell wait times til after you pay) and nothing; then when I called them after my order should have arrived, it had been canceled, unbeknownst to me, no call no text.

name: Sara Black
text: Great idea to begin with

name: jennifer Gaylor
text:
Great service, punctual, affordable.
Hot food delivery. Success!

name: Mizzuz Mo
text: I used to love them even though prices changed without warning because i don't have a lot of extra money and it was such a treat whenever i could order😛. HOWEVER, i will NEVER use them again since one of the drivers falsified tips!!! I asked the guy in charge about weird extra charges on my bank statement and he said they would probably fall off but second receipt shows the amounts categorized as tips i didn't authorize. And that's just...dishonest and theft😡.

name: D T (Raven)
text: Driver was nice even called to say he was late because he was still waiting on my order and nothing was left out

name: Stephanie Green
text: Only bc I couldn’t give it a zero. Will never use them again! We’ve used them a few times since we’ve moved here and wow today they literally messed up for last time. It’s our anniversary today so we decided we’d stay home and relax so we order from here and OMG where do I begin..Let’s just say three hours later six phone calls, late for work bc still waiting on our food so had to actually jump In the car to run down the road to the nearest fast food to eat a bite before I have to go to work. I’ll never use this business again. Hope y’all have better experiences if u choose to use them.

name: Lacey Harris
text: I have had minor problems here and there with this service and today's issue wasn't that bad, but it's everything rolled into one that just doesn't make it worth it anymore. There are always discrepancies with the menus on the Gadsden to Go site and apps and what the restaurant actually serves. The prices on the site and app compared to just going to get the food are ridiculous. But the food is delivered in a timely manner and USUALLY the communication is pretty good. Today was not the case on that though and I was very disappointed. I think I'll just get off my lazy behind and go get my food from now on. It'll be cheaper, quicker, and more accurate.

name: Eddy Cunningham
text: I ordered at 3:50 pm today. Received  confirmation of my order at 3:57. Delivery at 5:00 pm.  No delivery.  They don''t understand why I have confirmation and no record of my order. They promise to not charge my card.Never again.

name: Lashaye 210
text: Very rude older lady and added there own $3.20 tip to my order that has never happend through them before while i oredred and first said she didnt have change then pulled money out of her pocket very bad seevice experience.

name: George Walker
text: Their service has been excellent

name: Beth Pugatch
text: Gadsden to go is great except i had a girl driver that had no change for a 20. It was very disappointing.

name: Dillon Compton
text: gave me a credit and refund when it was very needed . Won’t go into detail but they do care about their customers .

name: Zachary Burns
text: Great service. Efficient and kind

name: Claudia Nazzaro
text: Love them! Great service overall 👍

name: sheri cain
text: Brought wrong order twice and would not replace it, bad customer service! I will never use them again!

name: Xuan-nhi Nguyen
text: They gave me the wrong order

name: who is that right there
text: Horrible horrible service

name: Angela King
text: They got my order wrong 3 times in a row  so will not us again called to tell them they said it was because of the menu not has not  changed

name: crystal graham
text: Orders have been wrong lately

name: Michael Burnell
text: Great service!

name: Tristan Knox
text: My orders are almost always wrong and/or very late.

name: DANGEROUS DYLAN
text: Fast and friendly!!!!!
